patthana6.1:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:4.1.pli: Hetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ sahetukañca nahetuṃ sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:5.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:6.1.pli: Hetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:7.1.pli: Naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:11.1.pli: Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana6.1:12.1.pli: Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana6.1:13.1.pli: Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu sahetuko dhammo hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana6.1:14.1.pli: Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā hetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā nahetussa sahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu sahetuko ca nahetu sahetuko ca dhammā hetussa sahetukassa ca nahetussa sahetukassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:15.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:17.1.pli: Hetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:18.1.pli: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:19.1.pli: Hetuṃ ahetukañca nahetuṃ ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:20.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:22.1.pli: Hetu ahetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana6.1:23.1.pli: Hetu ahetuko dhammo hetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Hetu ahetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana6.1:24.1.pli: Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Nahetu ahetuko dhammo hetussa ahetukassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:25.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cattāri, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṃ, nissaye upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme …pe… jhāne ekaṃ, sampayutte ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:27.1.pli: Hetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto ca nahetu hetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:28.1.pli: Nahetuṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:29.1.pli: Hetuṃ hetusampayuttañca nahetuṃ hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:30.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:31.1.pli: Hetu hetusampayutto dhammo hetussa hetusampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:34.1.pli: Hetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:35.1.pli: Nahetuṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:36.1.pli: Hetuṃ hetuvippayuttañca nahetuṃ hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:37.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana6.1:39.1.pli: Hetu hetuvippayutto dhammo nahetussa hetuvippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:40.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… avigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:42.1.pli: Hetuṃ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:43.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:44.1.pli: Hetuṃ hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu hetu ceva hetusampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:45.1.pli: Nahetuṃ hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu hetusampayutto ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:46.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:47.1.pli: Nahetuṃ ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:49.1.pli: Hetuṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:50.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:51.1.pli: Hetuṃ sappaccayañca nahetuṃ sappaccayañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:52.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:54.1.pli: Hetu sappaccayo dhammo hetussa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:55.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Pañhāvārampi evaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana6.1:56.1.pli: Hetuṃ saṅkhataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu saṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:58.1.pli: Hetuṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:59.1.pli: Nahetuṃ anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:60.1.pli: Hetuṃ anidassanañca nahetuṃ anidassanañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:63.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:64.1.pli: Hetuṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu appaṭigho ca nahetu appaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:65.1.pli: Nahetuṃ appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:66.1.pli: Hetuṃ appaṭighañca nahetuṃ appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:67.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:69.1.pli: Nahetuṃ rūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:70.1.pli: Hetuṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:71.1.pli: Nahetuṃ arūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:72.1.pli: Hetuṃ arūpiñca nahetuṃ arūpiñca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:73.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:75.1.pli: Hetuṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:76.1.pli: Nahetuṃ lokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:77.1.pli: Hetuṃ lokiyañca nahetuṃ lokiyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:78.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:80.1.pli: Hetuṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:81.1.pli: Nahetuṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:82.1.pli: Hetuṃ lokuttarañca nahetuṃ lokuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:83.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:85.1.pli: Hetuṃ kenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:88.1.pli: Hetuṃ kenaci naviññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu kenaci naviññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:91.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ca nahetu āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:92.1.pli: Nahetuṃ āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:93.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavañca nahetuṃ āsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:94.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana6.1:95.1.pli: Hetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:96.1.pli: Nahetuṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:97.1.pli: Hetuṃ noāsavañca nahetuṃ noāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:99.1.pli: Hetuṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:100.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:101.1.pli: Hetuṃ sāsavañca nahetuṃ sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:103.1.pli: Hetuṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:104.1.pli: Nahetuṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:105.1.pli: Hetuṃ anāsavañca nahetuṃ anāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:107.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:109.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:111.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:113.1.pli: Hetuṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:115.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavañceva āsavasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:117.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavasampayuttañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:119.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:121.1.pli: Hetuṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:124.1.pli: Hetuṃ saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… hetuṃ ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… hetuṃ oghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… hetuṃ yogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… hetuṃ nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… hetuṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu no parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:125.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha gocchakaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana6.1:127.1.pli: Hetuṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:128.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana6.1:129.1.pli: Hetuṃ sārammaṇañca nahetuṃ sārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:131.1.pli: Nahetuṃ anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:132.1.pli: Hetuṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:134.1.pli: Hetuṃ cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:136.1.pli: Nahetuṃ acetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:137.1.pli: Hetuṃ cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:139.1.pli: Nahetuṃ cittavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:140.1.pli: Hetuṃ cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:142.1.pli: Nahetuṃ cittavisaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu cittavisaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:143.1.pli: Hetuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:145.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana6.1:146.1.pli: Hetuṃ cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana6.1:147.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nocittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana6.1:148.1.pli: Hetuṃ cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha nava.)

patthana6.1:149.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana6.1:272.1.pli: Upādinnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… anupādinnaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:273.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:275.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:277.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:278.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nadassanena pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:279.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:280.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:281.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:282.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:283.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:284.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… avitakkaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:285.1.pli: Savicāraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… avicāraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:286.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… appītikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:287.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… napītisahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:288.1.pli: Sukhasahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nasukhasahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:289.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naupekkhāsahagataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:290.1.pli: Kāmāvacaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… nakāmāvacaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:291.1.pli: Rūpāvacaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… narūpāvacaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:292.1.pli: Arūpāvacaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… naarūpāvacaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:293.1.pli: Pariyāpannaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… apariyāpannaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:294.1.pli: Niyyānikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… aniyyānikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe….

patthana6.1:295.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:296.1.pli: Niyataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… aniyataṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe….

patthana6.1:297.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:298.1.pli: Sauttaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… anuttaraṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe…. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana6.1:299.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca …pe… araṇaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:300.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana6.1:301.1.pli: Araṇaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca araṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana6.1:302.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
